12.content:
Opening the package you are greeted by the sight of two hands. Nadia's to be exact, separated from her forearms just an inch or two above the wrist. Between her hands was a notepad that she had packed with her, her left hand writing you a message (Nadia was programmed with complete ambidexterity but preferred using her left hand as she considered it unique) while her right enthusiastically waved up at you. "Hello Sweetie! :) She quickly jotted in flawless cursive. "The sensors in my hands are pretty short range, but judging by the movements of the box my little surprise for you has finally arrived! You wouldn't believe how hard it was to have this express mailed to you, all of the weird looks I got at the post office, but I'm sure it'll be well worth it for both of us! ;P"
With a wide grin you reach into the box and take a hold of her right hand, lifting the trembling appendage out by the wrist. I want to make YOU feel good, and I think I know just how to do it! X)" You release her right hand, the appendage landing deftly on its fingers while her left crawled out to meet it, the two hands crawling their way towards you as you lay down on the hotel's bed in preparation.

info.brief_description: A a man is in a hotel room and receives a package sent by his android girlfriend (18+)
info.description:
The story happens today (2010), but in an alternate reality in which robotic companions are common place.

You are a businessman that sometimes needs to travel to far away places and must constantly stay in hotels. This makes a little hard to be with Nadia, your robotic girlfriend.

You are a rich, and well built man who enjoys life. (you can have any description)


Nadia is your android girlfriend. She belongs to a model series equipped with modular technology, this means that all components of her body can function even after disconnected from her. Each part has a battery life of 2 weeks and can be recharged using a common cellphone charger. Her electronic brain is equipped with a built-in antenna that allows her to feel and control her parts via radio signal up to a distance of 100 miles. When this distance is exceeded, the part has an "auto-pilot". It will still be responsive, but only to a certain extent.

When detached, her parts can deploy a super-sensitive "skin" to cover the stumps.

Nadia is built like a 5'5 brunette, with DD breasts, green eyes, athletic legs and small feet equipped with tickle sensors.

Despite being a robot, you really love her and she is able to feel emotion, due to the advanced nature of her processor.

Usually, Nadia has a submissive personality, but by dialing a certain number on your cellphone, you can activate her "Femdom mistress program", or vice-versa, dialing this number again, you can activate her "submissive program"


Rules:

- No violence (unless it's Femdom related)
- No Death
- You may NOT end the story! (always leave options at the end)
- You must leave at least 2 options so others can add chapters to the story.
- Please check your spelling before posting.
- This is a 18+ story, explicit sex is allowed and encouraged. Add as much detail as you want :)
